metadata.name: Galatea
metadata.description:
Photo taken during the pandemic shows act of intimacy between a man and a woman. At a second glance it becomes clear that a woman's head is actually a doll. The inspiration for this photo lies in the myth of Pygmalion and Galatea, but also in the time to come, the virtual world,robots, the consequences of social distance and alienation among people. Is isolation going to be a natural state for the man of the future? We have to wait to find out.

Title: Galatea

Collection: My Dool

Artist: Iris Ban

Year: 2021

Edition: 1/1


About the Artist: Iris Ban is Croatian award winning photographer, Master of Arts.

License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
